title: PermaBan Need Help Getting Account Back

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hey guys,
Last year I contemplated on whether or not I should sell my League Of Legends account that I have had since the beginning of season 2. However after thinking about it, I knew I had put too much time into the game and chose not to sell it. (At the time I had no idea that selling a LoL was against the terms of service). The people I wanted to sell my account to back then were MMOARMORY.com. They told me to change the username and password of my League of Legends account so I did. However after I did, I realized that I no longer wanted to sell the account because of how much it meant to me and created a support ticket to riot explaining this. Instead of helping me, they thought I sold the League of Legends account (which I did not) and Permanently banned it. (I didn't even notice this until a few days ago, trying to login to see all the changes that have been implemented during my time away from the game. So I didn't actually go against the terms of service because I never actually sold my account, I thought about it but changed my mind. So I have made a support ticket to riot and they haven't answered back to me. Hopefully I can receive a response faster from here and a Red riot member can help me with my situation. I've been playing League of Legends since the very beginning of season 2, have thousands of hours on record, was gold in season 3, diamond in season 5.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we rarely dive into account-specific information, since it's pretty sensitive information, especially around suspensions. I recommend you remain patient while an account specialist gets back to you regarding your suspension.

Let me know if you have any questions.
My account has been un perma-banned :D

It actually worked out for me and I was able to get my account back. They saw that I had a change of heart and did not want to sell the account, and that the account never had the ownership transferred. :)
